original_text: The Lord has also sent his servants, the prophets, to speak to you many times. You have refused to listen to them too.
korean_text: 그러므로 여호와께서 그의 모든 종 선지자를 너희에게 끊임없이 보내셨으나 너희가 순종하지 아니하였으며 귀를 기울여 듣지도 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord has also sent his servants
to speak to you many times
You have refused to listen to them too
